thread.title: BRIEF-Emakina Group H1 sales up 20 pct to 32.5 mln euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Emakina Group H1 sales up 20 pct to 32.5 mln euros

title: BRIEF-Emakina Group H1 sales up 20 pct to 32.5 mln euros
text:
BRIEF-Emakina Group H1 sales up 20 pct to 32.5 mln euros Sept 18 
Sept 18 Emakina Group SA : 
* H1 consolidated sales rose by 20 pct to 32.5 million euros ($36.95 million) compared with first half of 2014 
* H1 net profit (excluding amortisation of goodwill) amounted to 1.1 million euros compared with 129,115 euros during same period last year 
* H1 EBITDA 2.5 million euros versus 1.6 million euros year ago 
* Expects double-digit organic growth in sales for 2015 as a whole on basis of commercial debt and group's international expansion Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8795 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
